description: Watch amateur tennis player beat men's world number two Jannik Sinner and women's world number 117 Joanna Garland to earn A$1m (¬£496,835) in Australian Open's new Million Dollar One Point Slam.

title: Watch trailer for Mo Salah: Never Give Up
description: Watch the trailer for BBC documentary Mo Salah: Never Give Up.

title: Hasty or a shrewd move? Madrid in shock at swift Arbeloa appointment
description: Many Real Madrid fans are in shock at Alvaro Arbeloa's appointment as manager - is it a hasty move or a shrewd decision?

title: Bayern's record-breaking Bundesliga season in numbers
description: BBC Sport examines the stunning numbers behind Bayern Munich's record-breaking start to the Bundesliga season - and what records they could topple.

title: Why has no English boss won Premier League -  and who could be first?
description: Why has an English manager not won the Premier League? Chief football writer Phil McNulty explores who could make history.

title: More money and bigger say - are top-10 stars being reasonable?
description: As another Grand Slam season dawns, many players still believe they are undervalued and denied a voice in key decisions made by the majors.

title: Texans beat Steelers to take final play-off spot
description: The Houston Texans beat the Pittsburgh Steelers 30-6 to take the the final spot in the Divisional Round of the NFL play-offs.

title: Rodri and Cisse star in best goals of the FA Cup third round
description: Watch the best goals from across the FA Cup third-round weekend, including Isaac Buckley-Ricketts' stunner for Macclesfield FC.

title: 'Doesn't matter if you're 18 or 35' - Edwards embraces England's future
description: England coach Charlotte Edwards backs her experienced core after her first year in the job but challenges the next generation to take their places.

description: Wayne Rooney discusses Michael Carrick‚Äôs potential role as Manchester United caretaker and whether he‚Äôd join the coaching staff.

title: Late goals add shine as Liverpool beat spirited Barnsley in FA Cup
description: Liverpool score two late goals to add shine to their FA Cup third round victory over spirited League One side Barnsley at Anfield.

title: Cascarino denied WSL debut because of earring
description: West Ham's new signing Estelle Cascarino was denied a chance to make her Women's Super League debut because of an earring.

title: Tactics, transfers and turmoil - inside the fall of Amorim
description: After 14 months, Ruben Amorim has been sacked by Manchester United - but where did it all go wrong?

description: BBC Sport chief cricket reporter Stephan Shemilt reveals the inside story of England's Ashes defeat in Australia on and off the pitch.

description: In a new BBC documentary, Sir Chris Hoy shows how he is using his Olympic mindset to reframe his purpose following a terminal cancer diagnosis.

title: The man behind the headlines - Salah, by Klopp, Diaz and more
description: BBC Sport explores Mohamed Salah's personality with help from the people who know him best.

title: Inside McLaren's season - the rules, values, incidents & relationships
description: Intra-team title battles turn toxic far more often than not. Andrew Benson analyses how McLaren have maintained relative harmony between Lando Norris and Oscar Piastri.

title: England's AI World Cup masterplan - from perfecting penalties to powering players
description: BBC Sport hears from inside the England setup about how artificial intelligence is powering plans for next summer's World Cup.

title: 'Raise hell' - the fastest bowler you might not have heard of
description: The story of Duncan Spencer, the "frighteningly fast" bowler who could have played for England or Australia.

title: Toby Jones presents must-see Dad's Army moments
description: Watch Mainwaring dancing and sparring with Morecambe and Wise and a special tribute to Noel Coward
